mapper.select: select b.matching_id, b.uuid, b.lawyer_uuid, m.name as name, b.create_date, b.content, b.state, b.reservation_date, b.title, b.category from matching b left join member m on b.uuid = m.uuid where b.lawyer_uuid = #{lawyerUuid}

select b.matching_id, b.uuid, b.lawyer_uuid, m.name as name, b.create_date, b.content, b.state, b.reservation_date, b.title, b.category from matching b left join member m on b.uuid = m.uuid where b.uuid = #{uuid} or b.lawyer_uuid = #{uuid}
